page.title: 01Star Manor Militaires
page.content:
{Marching bands}are very popular in this area.The Manor Militaires (now Star Manor Militaires, sponsored by the local newspaper) was formed in 1981 by Roy Bennett. It was then the Manor Drum Band.He decided to form the band to keep kids off the street.
The group now has about 120 members. Their uniforms are black, white and red. The band have white hats with feathers in. The majorettes have white cowboy-style hats. The members of the band are aged 5 - 18.
The Manor Militaires have about 60 engagements this summer (1985), in competitions against other bands, or entertaining crowds at fetes, in parks or special events.
